Title: 69006 - EM - Polling Place Search - Search fields and bugs

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-requisite:\n- Have an existing Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Management > Polling Places > Search Polling Place\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Maintain Polling Place page is displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Check top of page
Test Steps.Step Expected: The title of the page should be "Maintain Polling Place"

Test Steps.Step Action: Check the search criteria
Test Steps.Step Expected:
The following fields are displayed:
- Polling Place Name
- Polling Place Street Name
- Precincts
- District
- Voter Center ID

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name field, enter the first few characters of the existing Polling Place Name followed by "%" (e.g. TH%)\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data entered

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Polling Places beginning with those first few characters entered will displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Reset"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria is cleared\n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name field, enter "%" followed by the last few characters of the existing Polling Place Name (e.g. TE%)\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data entered\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Polling Places ending with those last few characters entered will displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Reset"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria is cleared\n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name search field, enter "%" and then any few characters of the existing Election Template name followed by another "%" (e.g. %EC%)\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data entered

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Polling Places with those few characters entered (in that order) will be displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Reset"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria is cleared\n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name search field, enter the first few characters of the existing Polling Place Name followed by "%" and then any few characters that the name contains, followed by another "%" (e.g. T%PL%)\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data entered

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Polling Places that begin with those characters and contain those characters entered will be displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Reset"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria is cleared\n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name search field, enter "%" and then any few characters of the existing Polling Place Name followed by another "%" and then the last few characters of the Polling Place Name (e.g. %CT%E)\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Date entered

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Search"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Only the Polling Places that finish with those characters and contain those characters entered will be displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Reset"\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria is cleared\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Repeat steps 5-19 this time for Polling Place Street Name and Voter Center ID fields
Test Steps.Step Expected: Polling Place Street Name and Voter Center ID search fields work as expected the same as Polling Place Name

Test Steps.Step Action: From the District search criteria dropdown select the District linked to the existing Polling Place and click "Search"
Test Steps.Step Expected: All Polling places under that District will be displayed and your existing Polling Place will also be shown

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate from Home > Polling Places > Search Polling Place and check for the presence of the "Health Care Facility" checkbox.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The "Health Care Facility" checkbox is visible and functional.\n

Test Steps.Step Action:
Navigate from Home > Polling Places > Search Polling Place and 2. Verify the presence of:
- Early Voting Location
- Voter Center
- Drop Box Location
Test Steps.Step Expected: All existing checkboxes are visible and functional.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate from Home > Polling Places > Search Polling Place and Select multiple checkboxes and Deselect one checkbox (e.g., "Health Care Facility").\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: The deselected checkbox becomes unchecked.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate from Home > Polling Places > Search Polling Place and Select multiple checkbox options and Save the polling location details and Navigate away and return to the polling location type selection.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The previously selected checkboxes remain checked.\n

Title: 69007 - EM - Polling Place Search - Update Polling Place Search Screen with ADD Button Functionality

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-requisite:\n- Have an existing Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Management > Polling Places > Search Polling Place\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Maintain Polling Place page is displayed\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Use any of the search criteria options to search for the existing Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: The "SEARCH" button works as expected and initiates the search, the existing Polling Place will be listed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "RESET"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The search criteria will be cleared

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Polling Place Name search field enter a name that doesn't already exist and click "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: No results will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "ADD"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Add Polling Place page will be displayed and the Polling Place Name will be pre-filled with what you searched for

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Cancel"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Maintaining Polling Place page will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Repeat steps 5 to 7 for Polling Place Street Name and Voter Center ID search fields
Test Steps.Step Expected: All search fields are pre-populated over to the Add Polling Place page correctly when searched for and then clicking "ADD"

Test Steps.Step Action: Repeat steps 5 to 7 for Precincts and Districts search dropdowns\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precincts and Districts should not pre-populate over to the Add Polling Place page when searching and then clicking "ADD"

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Polling places->Search Polling Place->Select a record from the search results->Click on View
Test Steps.Step Expected: Additional contacts tab must be added

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify below fields are displayed correctly
first name
last name
position
work phone
mobile phone
email
address
Add(Button)
Actions
Test Steps.Step Expected: All the page elements must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on Actions->edit
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Text fields on the Update Contact page should be editable.\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Make changes and click on save button
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Updates must be saved successfully\n2.User must return to Polling place page

Test Steps.Step Action: Make changes and click on cancel button\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Updates should not be saved \n2.User must return to Polling place page\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "ADD" on Additional Contacts Page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Fill all the mandatory fields and click "ADD"

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify the new contact  is added to the polling place ->Additional contacts tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.New additional contact must be added successfully \n2.Verify the data displayed on Additional contacts grid matches the data entered in Add Contact Page

Test Steps.Step Action: select a record from rid and the Click on Actions->Delete
Test Steps.Step Expected: Additional contact must be deleted successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify the primary contact information is  displayed on the polling place page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Data must be displayed appropriately only primary contact information must be displayed on polling place page

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify additional contacts  are not displayed on the polling place page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Additional contacts  must be displayed in the tab section\n

Title: EM - PollingPlace - Add/Maintain Polling Place Inventory

Test Steps.Step Action: The following steps will be used in order to exercise and test 'Add/Maintain Inventory' functionality within a 'Polling Place'.\nTester will need to be logged in as a region. Click 'System Management' > 'Login As Region" > Select a region from the dropdown and click 'Login As Region' button.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to the 'Polling Place' screen\nEM > Polling Places >Search Polling Places > Click 'Actions' > Click 'View'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Polling Places' screen\n'Inventory' tab appears in the grid\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Inventory' tab
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Inventory tab is displayed
'Add' button is displayed
'Actions', 'Inventory Item', 'Description', and 'Count' are displayed as grid columns
Any previously added polling place inventory items are displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add'
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land on 'Add Inventory' Screen
'Inventory Item', 'Status' dropdowns are displayed.
'Vendor/ Manufacturer', 'Make', 'Count', 'Model', 'Serial Number', 'Certification Attachment', 'Description' fields are displayed.
'Date of Certification' field and Calendar Icon are displayed, 
 'Add/Maintain Items', 'Save', 'Cancel' buttons are displayed .
Any Previously created inventory items are displayed in the 'Inventory Item' dropdown

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add/Maintain Items'
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land on 'Inventory Items' screen.
'Actions', 'Inventory Item', and 'Description' columns appear in the grid.
'Add' and 'Back' buttons appear.
Any previously created inventory items for this polling place populate the grid.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Add'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Inventory Item' Screen\n'Inventory Item' and 'Description' fields displayed\n'Save' and 'Cancel' buttons displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter an inventory item, and a description of the item and click 'Save'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land back on the 'Inventory Items' screen.\nSuccess notification is displayed\nThe Item you created is displayed in the Grid appropriately.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Edit' for a given item
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Update Inventory Item'

Test Steps.Step Action: Update the item and description fields then click 'Update'\n
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Land back on the 'Inventory Items' screen.
Success notification is displayed.
The item has been updated and displays properly in the grid.

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Back'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Inventory' screen

Test Steps.Step Action: Click the 'Inventory Item' dropdown and choose the previously updated item\nEnter a count number, and add a comment.\nClick 'Save'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land in the 'Inventory' tab of the 'Polling Place' screen\nReceive a success message\nThe inventory item populates the grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Edit' for the inventory item
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on the 'Update Inventory Screen'

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Cancel'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land back on the inventory tab of the polling place

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'Actions' then click 'Delete' for the inventory item\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Confirmation popup/modal appears

Test Steps.Step Action: Click 'OK'
Test Steps.Step Expected: Modal closes\nSuccess message is displayed\nThe inventory item has been removed and is no longer displayed in the grid

Test Steps.Step Action: \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Title: 69032-EM-PollingPlace-Validate Precinct can not be assigned to Multiple Polling Places

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM-PollingPlace-Search Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Polling Place screen must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click Actions-View-Precinct Assignment-Add/Maintain
Test Steps.Step Expected: Assign Polling Place Precincts screen must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select a Precinct that is currently assigned to another Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: System must display below error message\n"Precinct already assigned to another Polling Place"

Test Steps.Step Action: \n
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Precondition:1.Polling Places must be assigned to a precinct\n2.Polling places that have any of the following checkboxes selected—Early Voting, Vote Center, Drop Box, or Healthcare Facility on —will be displayed on this page
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM-Elections-Search-Actions-Manage Polling location/Precinct
Test Steps.Step Expected: Polling Place and Precinct Assignment Screen must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Polling places and precincts must be displayed under respective categories
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Early Voting 
Vote Center
Drop Box
Healthcare Facility

Test Steps.Step Action: When a user navigates to the page system must only display the precincts/polling places which are unassigned
Test Steps.Step Expected: System should not display already assigned polling places /precincts

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify each nod/category is displaying the correct polling locations
Test Steps.Step Expected: Each category or node, such as Early Voting, should only display polling locations that have the early voting checkbox selected at the time of creating or updating the  polling booth

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify the precinct assigned to  polling booth
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precinct assigned on the Police place search  page must be displayed appropriately

Title: 69188-EM - Polling Place / Election - View Assigned Polling Locations and Precincts for an Election

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM->Elections->Election Search-Actions-Manage Polling location/Precinct
Test Steps.Step Expected: Manage Polling location Precincts screen must be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify below fields are displayed on the Page
Election Date Name
Election Type
Address
Precincts comma
Early Voting
Voter Center
Drop Box location 
Healthcare Facility
Test Steps.Step Expected: All the Fields must be displayed accordingly

Test Steps.Step Action: Election Date Name
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must be a dropdown menu and should be disabled

Test Steps.Step Action: Election Type
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must be a dropdown menu and should be disabled

Test Steps.Step Action: Polling place
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must display Polling name

Test Steps.Step Action: Address
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must display Polling address

Test Steps.Step Action: Precincts
Test Steps.Step Expected: Must display Precincts assigned - comma separated list of precincts assigned to each polling location

Test Steps.Step Action: Early Voting
Test Steps.Step Expected: Y/N

Test Steps.Step Action: Voter Center
Test Steps.Step Expected: Y/N\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Drop Box location
Test Steps.Step Expected: Y/N\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Healthcare Facility\n\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Y/N\n\n

Test Steps.Step Action:
Verify the sorting functionality for the columns displayed in the grid results
Polling PlaceAddress
Precincts 
Early Voting
Voter Center
Drop Box location 
Healthcare Facility
Test Steps.Step Expected: Sorting should function correctly for both ascending and descending order

Test Steps.Step Action: Verify Paging functionality
Test Steps.Step Expected: Paging must function correctly

Title: EM - 76754 - Verify the Ability to Add Standard Business Hours for a New Polling Place

Test Steps.Step Action: Preconditions - User is logged in with appropriate credentials (Region, Elections role). User navigates to the "Polling Places" page.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add" to create a new polling place.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the "Standard Business Hours" field, enter “9:00 AM - 5:00 PM”.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Save" to save the record.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The polling place must be successfully added with the "Standard Business Hours" field populated with the entered value.

Title: EM -  76754 - Verify the Ability to Edit Standard Business Hours for an Existing Polling Place

Test Steps.Step Action: Given user is logged in with appropriate credentials (Region, Elections role). At least one polling place record exists.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for an existing polling place record.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Edit" button for the polling place.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the "Standard Business Hours" field, modify the text to any other value.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Save" to save the updated record.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The polling place is successfully updated with the new "Standard Business Hours" value.

Title: EM - 76754 - Verify the Standard Business Hours Field is Optional

Test Steps.Step Action: Given User is logged in with appropriate credentials (Region, Elections role). User navigates to the "Polling Places" page.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add" to create a new polling place.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Leave the "Standard Business Hours" field blank.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Save" to save the record.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The polling place is saved successfully without any value in the "Standard Business Hours" field.

Title: EM - 76754 - Verify No Validation for the Free-Form Field

Test Steps.Step Action: Given User is logged in with appropriate credentials (Region, Elections role). User navigates to the "Polling Places" page.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Add" to create a new polling place.
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: In the "Standard Business Hours" field, enter an invalid value (e.g., "12345 ABC" or "invalid hours").
Test Steps.Step Expected: \n

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Save" to save the record.
Test Steps.Step Expected: The polling place is saved successfully with the entered value in the "Standard Business Hours" field, as no validation is required.

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to EM->Polling Places->Search Polling Place->ADD\n\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Land on 'Add Polling Place' screen\n

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter 'Polling Place Name 'along with  the mandatory  address fields and click on Submit(Must enter a valid address)
Test Steps.Step Expected: 1.Entered address location must be pointed on the GIS Map\n2.Coordinates must be returned and displayed on the Map
